article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10hIYMk hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: You're Not Depressed

div.p: A new book reveals why a third of Americans convinced themselves they’re depressed—and what we can do to get sensible diagnoses.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-1086bS1 hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: The 6 Best Cars From The 2013 New York International Auto Show

div.p: An electric hatchback from Mercedes-Benz, the track-ready, street-legal Jaguar XKR-S GT, and more!

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-L5yyH1 hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: READING THIS STORY IS DEFINITELY WORTH IT

h2.a: Is Picking A Penny Up Off The Ground Ever Worth It?

div.p: “If you carry a penny in your coin tray, how long would it take for that penny to cost you more than a cent in extra gas?”

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-175kXNq hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Four Reasons Not To Take North Korea’s Threats Of Nuclear War Too Seriously

div.p: Today North Korea declared itself in a “state of war” with South Korea. Rockets are reportedly on standby to “mercilessly strike” the United States. But here are some reasons not to worry—at least not yet.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11Xeqkh hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: NOW WITH THE DOUBLE THE HOMELESS PEOPLE

h2.a: A First Look At The 'Grand Central Station' Of San Francisco

div.p: Trajsbay, a multi-modal transit hub in downtown San Francisco, aspires to be a monument for the city.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11ZqEN1 hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: How Indiana Jones Was Born

div.p: In 1978, George Lucas had an idea for a movie called "Raiders of the Lost Ark," and invited Steven Spielberg and screenwriter Lawrence Kasdan to a brainstorming session to flesh it out.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-107Xkjc hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Why Aren't Asian Actors Getting Leading Roles In Hollywood?

div.p: As Hollywood is struggling with diversity, women and black people are making a few strides, but, as actor Masi Oka — known for Heroes and Hawaii 5-0 — tells The Hollywood Reporter, Asians are getting left behind.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XsOEFD hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: THANKS TO THE GRACE OF WILL

h2.a: Did TV Change America’s Mind On Gay Marriage?

div.p: From Billy Crystal's pioneering role on "Soap" to "Ellen" and "Modern Family," TV has made gays seem normal.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XgJZY9 hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Six Words That Mean Something Very Different To Porn Stars

div.p: When you say ‘ATM’ to a porn star, she doesn’t think of a cash dispenser. Aurora Snow explains the industry’s down-low lingo. And what’s this about piña colada mix?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-107ISrx hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Drug Dealer Sentenced To Write 5,000-Word Essay

div.p: A UK judge sentences a man to write about the "dangers of marijuana," or go to jail.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-X3YDQr hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: How To Stop Robocalls Once And For All

div.p: You know what? You don't have to put up with it. Here's how to hang up on telemarketers and their mechanical minions. For good.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Xi8DI3 hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Sorry, Chocolate Might Cause Acne After All

div.p: Just in case you were thinking of enjoying the tasty gifts bestowed upon you by the Easter bunny, the BBC would like you to keep in mind that they might ruin your beautiful face.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Zszr2y hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: High-Speed Photography Of Light Bulbs Exploding

div.p: Chemist and photographer Jon Smith fills light bulbs with unusual objects like chalk dust, candies, sprinkles, or even beer caps, shoots the bulbs with a pellet gun, and captures the moment using high-speed photography.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-164az5d hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Can North Korea Really Nuke Austin?

div.p: Obviously, it's possible that U.S. intelligence and independent analyses underestimate North Korea's capabilities. But for comparison purposes, here's the extent of North Korea's missile range according to Western experts.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10iHOjB hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Where Have All The Physical QWERTYs Gone?

div.p: Survey the mobile landscape and it's filled with people fondling their giant slabs of touch, happily typing away on glass.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-13DiT0g hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: The King Of Oontz Oontz Oontz

div.p: Four years ago, he was just some Swedish kid named Tim who liked messing around on his laptop at home. One iTunes-dominating dance hit later, he's Avicii, world's hottest DJ, making $250,000 a night to keep the Ecstasy-dosed masses moving.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-17574yP hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Why Eat Peeps At Easter?

div.p: Along with Easter comes a barrage of Easter candy, perhaps none as much a pop-culture curiosity as Peeps.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-X3Hsyh hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: The Big Bankroll Behind Cyber-Terrorists

div.p: "Cyber-fighters of Izz ad-Din al-Qassam" launch a wave of attacks on US banks.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-107Tp5W hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Smell-O-Vision, Now With Improved Resolution

div.p: A team of designers at Tokyo University of Agriculture and Technology have created a "smelling screen" that can emit the scent of a displayed object right in the portion of the screen where it appears.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YOPl85 hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: What's The Deadliest Power Source?

div.p: Coal, nuclear, oil, wind, gas, solar—which one is going to kill you?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-16mrToj hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: America's Original Craft Brewer Is Back

div.p: In 1976, Jack McAuliffe was fed up with the miserable beer selection in America. So he opened his own brewery. Though it failed miserably, he inspired an entire generation of craft brewers. Now he's back.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZHWNoc hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: HOW WE KNOW THE TERRORIST HAVEN'T WON

h2.a: The Stunning Ascendance Of America's Crazy Drunk Uncle: Florida

div.p: Here are five more reasons why Florida is the nation's current cultural capital.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-165dsTy hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: 'G.I. Joe 2' Producer: ‘Transformers’ Crossover Movie Is A Possibility

div.p: It was only a matter of time before the producer was asked about a "G.I. Joe" and "Transformers" team-up film – since the pairing has been the subject of multiple comic book story lines.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YK55MU hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: DON'T WANT TO MESS UP THE SHEETS

h2.a: Men Who Do More Housework Have Less Sex

div.p: Conventional wisdom suggests that women are drawn to men who help out around the house. Yet new research indicates that some divisions of labor may be sexier than others.
